name: getrandomsolution
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool pocket_cube_solver.
Tool description: Returns the list of all optimal solutions ( QTM not HTM ) for a given pocket cube ( 2x2x2 ) position.
API description: Fetches a JSON data consisting of a random optimal solution for a given cube position.

position.description: The cube position for which to retrieve the random optimal solution.
